lead_paragraph: The former Cincinnati Bengals receiver Chris Henry has been suspended indefinitely by the N.F.L. The Bengals released Henry on April 3 after he was arrested for the fifth time. Henry is scheduled for trial June 24 on charges of assault and criminal damaging. A man accused Henry of punching him in the face and breaking his car window with a beer bottle.
